name: Fish Struggles
description: Fish Struggles is a game that focuses on a wicked problem, and that problem being over fishing. The player start their journey as a fry in a small pond and they make their way through the river into the ocean where the players must be careful not to get eaten by predator's or blown up by mines. They must scavenge the ocean in search for food while they make their way deeper and deeper into the abyss, to eventually return to their birth ground and to start a new.
